# Resources

---

## Paper

- [2018_icassp_xvectors.pdf](https://www.danielpovey.com/files/2018_icassp_xvectors.pdf)
- [WavLM: Large-Scale Self-Supervised Pre-Training for Full Stack Speech Processing](https://arxiv.org/abs/2110.13900)
- [VoxPopuli: A Large-Scale Multilingual Speech Corpus for Representation Learning, Semi-Supervised Learning and Interpretation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2101.00390)
- [GigaSpeech: An Evolving, Multi-domain ASR Corpus with 10,000 Hours of Transcribed Audio](https://arxiv.org/abs/2106.06909)
- [Libri-Light: A Benchmark for ASR with Limited or No Supervision](https://arxiv.org/abs/1912.07875)
- [2203.15974](https://arxiv.org/pdf/2203.15974)
